items.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

monster.name: Awakened Zurkhwood
idiomes: one language known by its creator

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si tree es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal zurkhwood mushroom.

trait.name: Mute
entries: If the awakened zurkhwood was created by a myconid sovereign, it can't speak.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Bridesmaid of Zuggtmoy
idiomes: understands Abyssal però no pot parlar

trait.name: Fungus Stride
entries: Once on its turn, the bridesmaid can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living mushroom or fungus patch within 5 feet and emerge from another within 60 feet of the first one, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second mushroom or fungus patch. The mushrooms and patches must be large or bigger.

action.name: Hallucination Spores
entries: The bridesmaid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10} or be {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, the target is {@condition incapacitat}. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Infestació Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The bridesmaid releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers durant 1 minut. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10}. Si supera, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. Si falla, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table in appendix D) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must be repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

trait.name: Mushroom Portal
entries: The chamberlain counts as a mushroom for the Fungus Stride feature of the bridesmaid of Zuggtmoy.

trait.name: Poison Spores
entries: Whenever the chamberlain takes damage, it releases a cloud of spores. Creatures within 5 feet of the chamberlain when this happens ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. A creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The chamberlain makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Infestació Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The chamberlain releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers durant 1 minut. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12}. Si supera, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. Si falla, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table in appendix D) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must be repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

monster.name: Chuul Spore Servant
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The spore servant makes two pincer attacks.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent. L'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the spore servant doesn't have two other creatures {@condition grappled}.
Horgar has been affected by the demon lords let loose in the Abyss during the Rage of Demons storyline. Roll on the
to determine Horgar's flaw.

trait.name: Resiliència Duergar
entries: Horgar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition fascinat} or {@condition paralitzat}.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: Horgar té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Guants de Poder d'Ogre
entries: Horgar wields {@item Guants de Poder d'Ogre} giving him a Força score of 19 (+4).

trait.name: Coratge
entries: Horgar has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition acovardit}.

action.name: Enlarge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, Horgar magically increases in size, along with anything he is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, Horgar is Large, doubles his damage dice on Força-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Força checks and Força saving throws with advantage. If Horgar lacks the room to become Large, he attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: Invisibility (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Horgar magically turns {@condition invisible} until he attacks, casts a spell, or uses his Enlarge, or until his concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment Horgar wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with him.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Horgar fa dos atacs armats cos a cos.

action.name: Warhammer +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) de dany contundent, o 11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans. While Horgar is enlarged, the damage increases to 15 ({@dice 2d8 + 6}) or 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany contundent, respectively.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Leadership (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, Horgar can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that he can see within 30 feet of Horgar makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand Horgar. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if Horgar is {@condition incapacitat}.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: Horgar adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Horgar must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de Droki's és Saviesa ({@dc 13} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Droki wears {@item botes de velocitat}.

trait.name: Insanity
entries: Droki té avantatge a salvar contra ser {@condition fascinat} o {@condition acovardit}.

trait.name: Atac Furtiu (1/Torn)
entries: En Droki fa 7 ({@dice 2d6}) extra de dany quan impacta amb un atac armat i: o bé té avantatge a impactar, o bé l'objectiu té un aliat d'en Droki a 5 peus que no està {@condition incapacitat} i l'atacant no té desavantatge a impactar.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The derro té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the derro té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Droki fa dos atacs with his shortsword

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant. The sword is coated with serpent venom that wears off after the first hit. A target subjected to the venom ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: Droki adds 3 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Droki must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Drow Spore Servant
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Acid Vial
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany d'àcid.

items.name: Alchemist's Fire
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de foc at the start of each of the target's turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a successful {@dc 10} Destresa check to extinguish the flames.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The darkhaft és Intel·ligència ({@dc 10} salvació de conjur) pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament, sense requerir components:

trait.name: Resiliència Duergar
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition fascinat} or {@condition paralitzat}.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the duergar té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Enlarge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the màgia duergarally increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Força-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Força checks and Força saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany perforant while enlarged.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany perforant while enlarged.

action.name: Invisibility (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The màgia duergarally turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The Keeper of the Flame és Saviesa (spell save {@dc 12}.) Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament, sense requerir components:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The Keeper of the Flame és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 3. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The Keeper of the Flame has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Resiliència Duergar
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition fascinat} or {@condition paralitzat}.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the duergar té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Enlarge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the màgia duergarally increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Força-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Força checks and Força saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany perforant while enlarged.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany perforant while enlarged.

action.name: Invisibility (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The màgia duergarally turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

monster.name: Duergar Spore Servant
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Resiliència Nana
entries: The scout has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The scout has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The scout fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The statue makes four sword attacks.

items.name: Espasa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) de dany tallant.

items.name: Wretched
entries: Gash has disadvantage on Saviesa checks and Saviesa saving throws because of the physical and mental abuse he has suffered. A restabliment menor spell rids him of these effects.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The lizard pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Camouflage
entries: The octopus has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Grisha is a 6th-level-spellcaster. His habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Saviesa ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

spells: {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Grisha fa dos atacs with his +1 flail.

action.name: Flail +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent

monster.name: Hook Horror Spore Servant
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The spore servant makes two hook attacks.

action.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Ilvara wields a {@item tentacle vara} in addition to her scourge.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 1 poison damage.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Cua Espinosa
entries: When a creature provokes an opportunity attack from the ixitxachitl, the ixitxachitl can make the following attack instead of using its bite.
{@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: El ixitxachitl és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 11} salvada de conjur), {@hit 3} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The ixitxachitl has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Cua Espinosa
entries: When a creature provokes an opportunity attack from the ixitxachitl, the ixitxachitl can make the following attack instead of using its bite.
{@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Khalessa owns a {@item barret de camuflatge}, which she uses to appear as a female drow while in the company of drow.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Khalessa pot llançar aquest conjur innatament, sense que calguin components materials:

trait.name: Resiliència Nana
entries: The guard has advantage on saving throws against poison.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Acció Astuta
entries: On each of its turns, the spy pot Córrer, Destravar-se o Amagar-se com a acció bonus.

trait.name: Atac Furtiu (1/Torn)
entries: The spy deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't {@condition incapacitat} and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The spy fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Rajos d'Ull
entries: The beholder shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:

items.name: 1. Charm Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition fascinat} by the beholder durant 1 hora, or until the beholder harms the creature.

items.name: 2. Paralyzing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 3. Fear Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 4. Slowing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16}. Si falla, the target's speed is halved durant 1 minut. A més, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. La criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 5. Enervation Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany necròtic; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: 6. Telekinetic Ray.
entries: If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 16} or the beholder moves it fins a 30 peus in any direction. It is {@condition restrained} by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the beholder's next turn or until the beholder is {@condition incapacitat}.

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is moved fins a 30 peus in any direction. The beholder can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Narrak és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (Save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics) Narrak has two 2nd-level spell slots, which he regains after finishing a short or long rest. Coneix els encanteris de bruixot següents:

trait.name: Insanity
entries: Narrak té avantatge a salvar contra ser {@condition fascinat} o {@condition acovardit}.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Narrak té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: Narrak té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Armadura d'Ombres (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Narrak casts armadura de mag on himself

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Esdevenir les Ombres
entries: While he is in a dim light or darkness, Narrak can become {@condition invisible}. He remains so until he moves or takes an action or reaction.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30 ft., un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany d'àcid. A més, nonmagical armor worn by the target is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

items.name: Regeneració
entries: The pudding recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If the pudding takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the pudding's next turn. The pudding dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Eye Tattoos
entries: Shedrak has ten small eyes tattooed on his bald head that allow him to see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible.

items.name: Two Heads
entries: Because of its two heads, the Spider King has advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition encegat}, {@condition fascinat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition atordit}, and knocked {@condition inconscient}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The Pudding King és Intel·ligència ({@dc 12} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The Pudding King és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The Puddin. Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

trait.name: Camuflatge Petri
entries: The Pudding King has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made per a amagar-se en un terreny pedregós.

trait.name: Astúcia Gnoma
entries: The Pudding King té avantatge a salvar per Intel·ligència, Saviesa, i Carisma contra màgia.

trait.name: Insanity
entries: The Pudding King té avantatge a salvar contra ser {@condition fascinat} o {@condition acovardit}.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Canviar de Forma
entries: The Pudding King magically transforms into an {@filter ooze|bestiary|type=ooze}, or back into his true form. He reverts to his true form if he dies. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying is absorbed by the new form. In ooze form, the Pudding King retains his alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, and Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores, as well as this action. His statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form.

action.name: Create Green Slime (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: The Pudding King creates a patch of green slime (see "Dungeon Hazards" in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide). The slime appears on a section of wall, ceiling, or floor within 30 feet of the Pudding King.

trait.name: Pell Camaleònica
entries: The troglodita has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Ferum
entries: Any creature other than a troglodita that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodita ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition emmetzinat} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all trogloditas durant 1 hora.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the troglodita té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troglodita fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with either its claws or its greatclub.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: The troglodita spits acid in a line 15 feet long and 5 feet wide. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Mossegada Vampírica
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11} or its punts de vida màxims is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the ixitxachitl regains hit points equal to that amount. La reducció dura fins que l'objectiu acabi un Descans Llarg. The target dies if its punts de vida màxims is reduced to 0.

reaction.name: Cua Espinosa
entries: When a creature provokes an opportunity attack from the ixitxachitl, the ixitxachitl can make the following attack instead of using its bite.
{@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: El ixitxachitl és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 11} salvada de conjur), {@hit 3} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The ixitxachitl has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Mossegada Vampírica
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11} or its punts de vida màxims is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the ixitxachitl regains hit points equal to that amount. La reducció dura fins que l'objectiu acabi un Descans Llarg. The target dies if its punts de vida màxims is reduced to 0.

reaction.name: Cua Espinosa
entries: When a creature provokes an opportunity attack from the ixitxachitl, the ixitxachitl can make the following attack instead of using its bite.
{@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Veldyskar pot llançar aquest conjur innatament, sense que calguin components materials:

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (1/Dia)
entries: Si Yestabrod falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 3d4 + 1}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 3d4}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Caustic Spores (1/Dia)
entries: Yestabrod releases spores en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12} or rep {@dice 1d6} de dany d'àcid at the start of each of Yestabrod's turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Infestació Spores (1/Dia)
entries: Yestabrod releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers durant 1 minut. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12}. Si supera, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. Si falla, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table in appendix D) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must be repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

legendary.name: Corpse Burst
entries: Gore, offal, and acid erupt from a corpse within 20 feet of Yestabrod. Creatures within 10 feet of the corpse ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12} or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany d'àcid.

legendary.name: Foul Absorption
entries: Yestabrod absorbs putrescence from a corpse within 5 feet of it, regaining {@dice 1d8 + 2} hit points

trait.name: Mirada Petrificant
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 15 feet of the basilisk and the two of them can see each other, the basilisk can force the creature to make a {@dc 12} Constitució saving throw if the basilisk isn't {@condition incapacitat}. Si falla, the creature magically begins to turn to stone i està {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw Al final del seu proper torn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrificat} until freed by the  {@spell restabliment superior} spell or other magic.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the basilisk fins a l'inici del seu següent torn, when it can avert its eyes again. If it looks at the basilisk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the basilisk sees its reflection within 30 feet of it in bright light, it mistakes itself for a rival and targets itself with its gaze.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de verí.

items.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The thug té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de thug's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The thug makes two melee attacks

action.name: Maça
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant.
